data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.system_prompt: You are an expert creative story writer. You will be given three words (e.g., car, wheel, drive) and then asked to write a creative short story that contains these three words. The idea is that instead of writing a standard story such as "I went for a drive in my car with my hands on the steering wheel.", you come up with a novel and unique story that uses the required words in unconventional ways or settings.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.system_prompt: You are an expert creative story writer. You will be given three words (e.g., car, wheel, drive) and then asked to write a creative short story that contains these three words. The idea is that instead of writing a standard story such as "I went for a drive in my car with my hands on the steering wheel.", you come up with a novel and unique story that uses the required words in unconventional ways or settings.

data.output: In ancient times when gods still roamed among mortals there was one named Stampia who possessed immense power over land formations - her foot could create mountains while mere touch would carve valleys out deep enough they'd seem bottomless at night under starry skies without moonlight shining bright upon them giving all witness' sense hopelessness wash away like fallen leaves after autumn rain showers stop falling gently onto newly birthed earth waiting patiently yet eagerly expecting something greater ahead unknown untold destiny.

data.output: In ancient times when humans could still hear whispers from nature's core - there existed mystical healers who listened closely enough so they might tune into frequencies coming out through living things like trees which carried sacred knowledge within their cellular structure; Aria was one skilled at channeling this essence via playing melodies upon her magical tree-organ made entirely by weaving fibers harvested under moonlight allowing its harmonies resonate deeply throughout entire ecosystems balancing what had grown discordant while keeping equilibrium intact across all realms both seen & unseen alike thus maintaining order among earth creatures great/small requiring each sentient being simply needed only choose whether willing 'comply' embracing symphony rising free forming interconnected web existence now known today referred lovingly called “The Empire Of Resonance”.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.system_prompt: You are an expert creative story writer. You will be given three words (e.g., car, wheel, drive) and then asked to write a creative short story that contains these three words. The idea is that instead of writing a standard story such as "I went for a drive in my car with my hands on the steering wheel.", you come up with a novel and unique story that uses the required words in unconventional ways or settings.

data.output: In ancient times when mythical creatures roamed free under moonlit skies devoided by deep purple hues known colloquially among townsfolk now deceased - they called it 'the Gloom'. Within this eerie realm there existed great shadowy beings which served at all costs without any worldly desire except one unrelenting quest; They demanded souls who wished their eternal presence within human lives render Payment through macabre trials performed across rivers darkened waters every full lunar eclipse night. One brave mortal did thus dare defy conventional norms choosing rather death itself than bow down accept never-ending servitude imposed upon her kind if she were ever found wanting during final reckoning trial before chief Shadow entity awaiting patiently his subjects desperate plea hoping still somehow manage miraculously continue forever onward yet alas finally ceased Exist after performing greatest ultimate sacrifice so far written into hallowed annals untold forgotten lore left behind echoing only sorrowfully lonely silence where echoes whispering names once proud champions may also meet similar fate unknown amidst howling voids beckon some poor wretch lost roaming empty streets drenched city rain delugely pouring ceaselessly from black starless sky falling slowly indeed maddeningly drowning away small voice screams silently pleading its haunting beauty disappearing fast dissolving water sound tear soul disappear melting gone nothing remains...
